item.description:
Join for dinner and feel free to stay for the party 

Bella Luna is a lively and cool spot in a former brewery and has high ceilings, weathered brick walls, and exposed steel fixtures. A soothing red palette dominates throughout and extends from the walls, to the leather banquettes, and to the large, sparkly U-shaped bar that punctuates the mammoth space.  Star-shaped paper lanterns, ceiling spotlights, and vibrant, large-scale photographs throughout combine to give the spot a modern yet comfortable, cool, cosmic vibe. Eclectic comfort food is their focus and pizzas are their specialty. Milky Way lounge offers a lot of room for dancing.

 

8:00 PM - Dine in Bella Luna

9:30 PM - We'll move into the Milky Way Lounge for dancing

 

Here is a picture of the building in which Bella Luna and Milky Way are located.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

 

PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION:

Create your route at MBTA or Hop Stop

Take the Orange Line to Stony Brook Station. As you exit the station, turn left and walk up Boylston Street to the first stoplight. At the light, take a right onto Amory Street. The Brewery Complex is 1/2 mile up on your left. Bella Luna & The Milky Way Lounge is on the first floor, main entrance is on the right hand side of the building next to the smokestack.

PARKING INFORMATION: 
There are 80 complementary parking spaces on the Amory Street side of The Brewery Complex (do not park in the 15 minute spots next to Amory street or you may be towed)

 

Before I list the Reservation Rules, please understand the NO-SHOW policy was established to ensure everyone who wants to join can and it will be fairly and strictly enforced. I want to assure you I do understand if you've RSVPd YES and on the day of our meal you have a sudden change of plans because you're lost, you don't feel well or you have transportation issues. My only request is for you to let me know as soon as possible so we don't worry about you and our reservation is adjusted. As long as you contact me you will not be considered a NO-SHOW.

Rules for Events with Reservations:

If it is less than an hour from the meal and you are not able to attend or are running late, you MUST call or text me at (617) 445-7549            .

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

All RSVPs are on a first reply, first seated basis.

You may only RSVP YES or NO. Maybe isn't an option.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.

If you're not sure you can attend because you have other unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO with a comment.

If the meal is full and you wish to attend, please select WAIT LIST RSVP. When a spot opens, your RSVP will be changed to YES based on the time of your WAIT LIST RSVP and if you answered the RSVP question.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the meal and you have not attended nor contacted me, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If I change your RSVP to NO because you haven't replied to final update meal confirmation email deadline, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If any guests you've RSVPd for NO-SHOW each will count as if you've NO-SHOWED.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within an hour of the reservation, it is counted as a NO-SHOW if you do not contact me.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events with reservations you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.

An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email Tonya about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated so please, rate the event and venue by completing surveys afterward.

I will be arrive at 7:45 PM to welcome you from the Bella Luna bar.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tonya/Meetup reservation or call/text my cell (617) 445 7549

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Dining and/or Dancing Wednesday April 11th 8:00 PM
